revision.text:
{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Bola Mágica |image = [[File:Bag_Magic_Ball_Sprite.png]] |caption = Dibujo de la ''Bola mágica''. |dex = 20 |effect = Aumenta tu índice de captura }}
The '''Magic Ball''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it gives a bonus to the player's catch rate.
==Details==
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Nivel !! Efecto !! Requisitos de Mejora !! Coste de Mejora |- |0 || +5% al índice de captura || 250 Pokémon capturados || style="text-align:right" | 50,000 {{pdollar}} |- |1 || +6% al índice de captura || 250 Pokémon capturados || style="text-align:right" | 100,000 {{pdollar}} |- |2 || +7% al índice de captura || 750 Pokémon capturados || style="text-align:right" | 250,000 {{pdollar}} |- |3 || +8% al índice de captura || 1250 Pokémon capturados || style="text-align:right" | 500,000 {{pdollar}} |- |4 || +9% al índice de captura || 2500 Pokémon capturados || style="text-align:right" | 1,000,000 {{pdollar}} |- |5/Max || +10% al índice de captura || N/A || style="text-align:right" | N/A |- |}
== Trivia == * The artwork of the Magic Ball shares its design with the Premier Ball from the official games.
{{Oak items}}
[[Category:Oak Items]] [[Category:Items]]
revision.comment: Created page with "{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Bola Mágica |image = [[File:Bag_Magic_Ball_Sprite.png]] |caption = Dibujo de la ''Bola mágica''. |dex = 20 |effect = Aumenta tu índice de captura }}"
